data.post_title: Neil Fraistat Delivers Keynote in Vienna

pageContext.html: MITH Director Neil Fraistat delivered the keynote lecture Tuesday morning at the Supporting the Digital Humanities (SDH) Conference in Vienna. SDH2010 is the first conference that is jointly organized by the CLARIN and DARIAH initiatives, which are building the European research infrastructure for the humanities and related disciplines. You can follow the conference on Twitter with its hashtag, #SDH2010.
